DNS manager for WHMCS
In the beginning of 2017 we have released our open-source WHMCS provisioning module for DNS management. All our Premium and DDoS protected DNS plans are compatible. You can start reselling our DNS services under your brand with just few clicks.

DNS Failover Beta Access
Our DNS Failover and Monitoring service is open for Beta Access for the existing customers. It can be tested even with a Free Trial plan of our Premium DNS, DDoS Protected DNS or GeoDNS hosting plans. Read more about the DNS Failover here: https://www.cloudns.net/dns-failover/

Why ClouDNS?
We are a specialized company with over eight years experience in the DNS administration. The easy-to-use Control panel we provide is being developed and expanded with different functionalities every day. All its conveniences can be integrated with your instruments or website through our HTTP API – you can accomplish complete automation if you manage a lot of domain names.
Thousands of businesses have trusted in us to host over 350,000 domain names at our servers.
